DOC.brief_summary: The main objective trial determine whether current topical formulation GTX 2/3 reduces wrinkle skin ( crow 's foot ) single application Other evaluation criterion include : safety assessment local tolerance , depth facial wrinkle ( video microscopy image ) .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Cutaneous Formulation Gonyautoxin 2/3 ( GTX 2/3 ) Treatment Facial Wrinkles
DOC.detailed_description: This single volunteer group study . Each volunteer control . A volunteer receive active product contain cream one side face receive placebo cream side .
DOC.criteria: Women bearingchild potential adequate birth control method . Volunteers 30 60 year age . Subjects bilateral crow 's foot wrinkle . Regular user cosmetic product , willing able comply study objective . Signed informed consent . Any medical condition use medication could modify study result ( e.g . : NSAIDs , immunosuppressant drug , insulin ... ) . Any significant medical condition ( e.g . : diabetes mellitus , heart disease , liver disease ... ) . Any condition investigator 's opinion could appropriate participation trial . Any health condition could affect evaluation study parameter . Acute chronic skin disease . History allergic reaction cosmetic compound . Pregnancy , plan pregnancy breastfeeding . Allergy shellfish , fish sea product ( seaweed ) . Known suspected hypersensitivity study product compound . Participation another clinical trial within 30 day previous enrolment . Known suspected alcohol drug abuse .
